org.apache.flex.swf.types

Class GradientGlowFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.swf.types.GlowFilter
      • org.apache.flex.swf.types.GradientGlowFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataType

    public class GradientGlowFilter
extends GlowFilter
    The Gradient Glow filter is extension of the normal Glow IFilter and allow a gradient to be specified instead of a single color. Instead of multiplying a single color value by the shadow-pixel plane value, the shadow-pixel plane value is mapped directly into the gradient ramp to obtain the resulting color pixel value, which is then composited by using one of the specified compositing modes.
